trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Tacoma
There was one other sighting in Tacoma on or around May 17th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsApproximarely 2 hours earlier I had seen same object with 2 others outside on my deck. This time my wife called me out to have a cigarette and witin two minutes or so , the same type and size object moving west to east appeared( aspirin-sized) it got about mid-sky when a plane came into view . The object was moving almost exactly west to east, the plane was heading in the typical SW to NE and as the plane and object got close to each other I said to my wife that the pilot in the plane is probably able to see the UFO , then suddenly the light just went out or kinda faded out within 3 seconds. This only confirmed What I saw earlier in the night. I feel this object decided not to be visible anymore.
Summary: 2nd object - was a bright bluish white light moving west to east, moved halfway across sky then faded out when airplane appeared in sky.
